# LLDB Post-Run Summary Commands
# This file is automatically sourced after debug sessions complete
# Used by advanced debug configurations in launch.json

# Display custom type summaries for ADS containers
type summary add -F LLDB_Formatters.StaticArray_SummaryProvider "ads::arrays::StaticArray" -w ads
type summary add -F LLDB_Formatters.DynamicArray_SummaryProvider "ads::arrays::DynamicArray" -w ads
type summary add -F LLDB_Formatters.SinglyLinkedList_SummaryProvider "ads::lists::SinglyLinkedList" -w ads
type summary add -F LLDB_Formatters.DoublyLinkedList_SummaryProvider "ads::lists::DoublyLinkedList" -w ads

# Enable category
type category enable ads
